content: dishcloth chain 24 row 1 single_crochet in second chain from hook skip next chain 2 single_crochet in next st across turn ~ 23 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet skip next st 2 single_crochet in next st across turn ~ 23 single_crochet row 3-22 repeat row 2 twenty more times edging chain 1 single_crochet in first st * chain 1 skip next st single_crochet in next st across chain 1 single_crochet in same st as last st made working in ends of row chain 1 skip end of next row single_crochet in end of next row across chain 1 another easy dishcloth ** single_crochet in same st as last st made repeat from * by alaina smith lovinghandscrochet ending at ** join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet finish off ~ 48 single_crochet 48 chain-1 sps finished size 6¾ /17 cm square gauge 15 sts x 14 row in pattern = 4 /10 cm materials size us h-8 5mm crochet hook or size needed for gauge medium weight cotton yarn 1 oz /28g 48 yds /44 m abbreviations pattern is written with us abbreviations us abbreviation uk equivalent chain chain chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet space space space space st s stitch es st s stitch es notes repeat instructions in braces as indicated these are shorter repeats they are written this way to help simplify the written instructions and make things easier to read stitch counts follow instructions for most row/rounds and are separated from the instructions by a tilde ~ * and ** stars are used for longer repeats © alaina smith 2024 another easy dishcloth
